unnormalised: Infosys announced the appointment of Mr. Rajesh Nair as the new Chief Operating Officer (COO) effective 01/11/2024. Nair, previously serving as the President of the company, will report directly to the CEO, Mr. Salil Parekh. The change comes as Ms. Leela Krishnan, the current COO, steps down after a tenure of 15 years, according to a press release.
normalised: Infosys announced the appointment of Mister Rajesh Nair as the new Chief Operating Officer (C-O-O) effective first November two thousand and twenty four. Nair, previously serving as the President of the company, will report directly to the C-E-O, Mister Salil Parekh. The change comes as Missus Leela Krishnan, the current C-O-O, steps down after a tenure of fifteen years, according to a press release.

unnormalised: Industry analysts speculate that this leadership shift could indicate a strategic refocusing towards AI and cloud computing, areas where Mr. Nair has demonstrated considerable expertise. Sources close to the company suggest that the transition has been planned for Q3 2024, ensuring a smooth handover of responsibilities.
normalised: Industry analysts speculate that this leadership shift could indicate a strategic refocusing towards A-I and cloud computing, areas where Mister Nair has demonstrated considerable expertise. Sources close to the company suggest that the transition has been planned for Q three two thousand and twenty four, ensuring a smooth handover of responsibilities.

unnormalised: "Rajesh is a seasoned leader with a proven track record," said Mr. Parekh in a statement released this morning. "His insights and experience will be invaluable as we navigate the evolving tech landscape. We also extend our sincere gratitude to Ms. Krishnan for her dedication and contributions."
normalised: "Rajesh is a seasoned leader with a proven track record," said Mister Parekh in a statement released this morning. "His insights and experience will be invaluable as we navigate the evolving tech landscape. We also extend our sincere gratitude to Missus Krishnan for her dedication and contributions."

unnormalised: The appointment of Mr. Nair as COO comes at a crucial time as Infosys aims to achieve a revenue target of $20 Billion by FY25. The company's stock (INFY) saw a slight increase of 0.5% following the announcement at 14:30 hrs IST.
normalised: The appointment of Mister Nair as C-O-O comes at a crucial time as Infosys aims to achieve a revenue target of dollar twenty billion by F-Y twenty five. The company's stock (I-N-F-Y) saw a slight increase of zero point five percent following the announcement at fourteen thirty hours I-S-T.
